title: i didnt ge tthe teemo icon after i won doom bots
body: i read the forums for the halloween event and it said if i win doom bots of Doom i will get a teemo icon after i won it it did not give me the icon further more i reloged in the game and still didnt have it can someone help!!!

replies.body:
As the *Icons & Ward* section of the [Teemoing 2016 Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) mentions, Icons will be granted up to 2 weeks *after* **November 3rd, 2016** at **23:59 PDT**.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

**EDIT**: It looks like I was mistaking this Icon for the one from the Teemoing Browser game. The Icon for defeating *Doom Bots* should arrive *up to one week after you've won a Doom Bots match*.

I noticed the double asterisks section states "**Players who abandon the game will forfeit their icon. Icon will appear in your account up to one week after defeating Doom Bot mode.".

I had some problems with crashes happening across all gamemodes that started with Doom Bots. I ended up getting a Leaver Buster due to the crashes which has me worried that I won't get the icon due to circumstances that were out of my control. Will my worries hold true or is there a way that I can get the icon still?

Edit: I should mention that the match that crashed was not the match that I won in Doom Bots.

My assumption is that if you disconnect from a Doom Bots match and get marked as *Leaver* or *AFK*, you only forfeit your chances at getting an Icon for **that match* and not any others that you play. 

I hope that clears up your confusion.
Is this rewarded if you win in either queue?
Seems to be so, as long as it's a Doom Bots Mode, you should be good to go!
i beat it on the first day it came out, i beat it a few times and i still havnt gotten the icon
I think the icon will be granted at the end of the event. It happened with the starr guardian quiz icon as well.
